message: I'd like to request an @alphaonelabs.com email address. I'll trust your judgement as to the first part. I'm ordering samples to be delivered to the lab, if that's OK.

Also, I'm establishing relationships with schools, vendors, & other relevant organizations. Let me know if you want me to include A1L on that. Nobody that would be controversial, unless requested. I will be their point of contact for myself - let me know how the group would or wouldn't like to be involved (i.e. should this be done w/ or w/o @alphaone email addresses, etc).

Samples are great!  Whatever a company can give us to hack on is very appreciated.  I'd like to do a blog post maybe of the companies who've donated stuff to us.  AsyncLabs WiShields, Voltaic Systems LEDs and solar panels, and RedBull for cans of energy!  (and a cool invite)...
Thanks for the reminder, sent... For the google group you should be able to signup directly there.
And any type of relationship that you think will benefit the group, for sure, include us on there.
